alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 6:59PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Delaware and northern Sullivan Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 659 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Roscoe, or 14 miles northwest of Liberty, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rockland, Liberty, Neversink, Parksville, Hazel, Harvard, Grahamsville, Willowemoc, Peabrook and Fishs Eddy. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 90 and 99, and near 100A. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
